error.unknown: An unknown error has occurred. Please notify the developers about this.

deny.button: ❌ This button is not for you!

mission.notReady: ❌ You can only complete a discovery mission every 12 hours. Your next mission is available at <t:{time}:t>.
mission.expActive: ❌ Your Robo is already on an exploration. It returns at <t:{time}:t>.
mission.expStart: 🔍 You have started an exploration. Your Robo will return at <t:{time}:t>.
mission.expInactive: 🔍 You havn't started an exploration. Start one using `/exploration start`
mission.discActive: ❌ You have already started a discovery.

inventory.noExplorer: ❌ Unable to find that explorer. Are you sure they are in the SpaceExplorerForce?
inventory.notEnoughCredits: ❌ You don't have enough credits to do that.
inventory.notEnoughItems: ❌ You don't have enough items to do that.
inventory.dailyCooldown: ❌ You cannot collect your daily reward yet. Please come back <t:{time}:R>.
inventory.daily: 🎁 You have collected your daily reward. You got {amount} credits.

upgrade.noMaterials: ❌ You don't have enough materials to upgrade your Robo.
upgrade.success: 🎉 You have successfully upgraded your Robo to level {level}!
